Новая категория
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal', templateUrl: './modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal.component.css'], }) export class ModalComponent { private baseUrl: string = ""; public name: String = ""; public category!: Category; http: HttpClient; public hideModal: boolean = true; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.http = http; } public addCategory() { console.log(this.name + '!!!!'); var body = { } //return this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'Category/'+this.category).subscribe(result => { // console.log("ConsoleLOG" + result); //}); } Close() { this.hideModal = !this.hideModal; } } interface Category { id: number; name: string; }
